message:
#Repost @usarmy
・・・
#HonorThem
.
For more than 50 years, Soldiers from the #TheOldGuard honor our nation’s fallen military heroes by placing U.S. flags at gravesites of service members buried at both Arlington National Cemetery and  U.S. Soldiers’ & #Airmen’s Home National Cemetery just prior to the #MemorialDay weekend. More than 1,000 #Soldiers place over 250,000 flags in front of every headstone.
.
#Duty #Devotion #Sacrifice #ArmyLife #whyiserve 📸 by Elizabeth Fraser
